name: Amaury
bio: Amaury grew up loving video games, often staying up late playing PokÃ©mon Silver into the night. That curiosity naturally evolved into a passion for computers. He loves seeing the creative ways code can take shape on a screen. Amaury believes that with code, you can create anything, and the only limits are those of the mind. He's dedicated to building spaces that foster inclusion, curiosity, and merriment.
title: L10 Crashout
